headline: Is Ross Stores (ROST) Fairly Priced After Its Recent 3-Month Rally? A Fresh Look at Valuation
summary: Ross Stores (ROST) has quietly outperformed the broader market over the past 3 months, with shares up roughly 25%. That move has investors asking whether this off price retailer still offers reasonable upside. See our latest analysis for Ross Stores. That recent 30 day share price return of roughly 14 percent, capped by a 90 day gain of about 25 percent, builds on a solid 3 year total shareholder return above 60 percent. This suggests momentum is still leaning in Ross Stores' favor even after...
